channel.title: Looking for a blank server
channel.description:
I know what your thinking "USE THE SEARCH!!! OMFG!!!!!" WELL I did that for an hour or so with no luck, almost a trojan, and I'm just wondering if this type of a server even EXISTS.
[b]Im looking for a [i]blank[/i] server with these features:[/b] 1. Basic runescape with nothing custom in it (all NPC's removed though). 2. ALL commands removed (I spent 20 minutes trying to remove all the commands like "sweet" "leet" "god" "barrows" "cash" "killme" etc and got 100+ errors at the end... but a label for where I should put them maybe ( like "Custom Commands Go Here" ) 3. I need the basic movement and fighting IN the server 4. This one ISN'T a must have but it's something I would like; "noclip" fixed ([b]The command atleast! I also wouldn't mind following/attacking noclip fixed[/b])
Well that's about it, if any of you know one it would be AMAZING to have!! <3

item.title: Looking for a blank server
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

So you’re saying that you want a server with barely on it and then succesfully add code to it, but you wont even bother editing or coding that?

No I just have trouble DELETING lots of stuff from files

So does anybody know a good server like that? Preferably with client.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a blank server
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“walkineagle, post:6, topic:357599”]@the hartpaint I wouldnt know where anything went, I used to do java, now I code BASIC and its kind of hard to go back…

@iCreatedHorror I did search, found about 3, tried editing all of them came up with 100+ errors.[/quote]
Then you’re probably missing brackets, not a hard fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a blank server
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

I know what your thinking “USE THE SEARCH!!! OMFG!!!” WELL I did that for an hour or so with no luck, almost a trojan, and I’m just wondering if this type of a server even EXISTS.

Im looking for a blank server with these features:

  1. Basic runescape with nothing custom in it (all NPC’s removed though).
  2. ALL commands removed (I spent 20 minutes trying to remove all the commands like “sweet” “leet” “god” “barrows” “cash” “killme” etc and got 100+ errors at the end… but a label for where I should put them maybe ( like “Custom Commands Go Here” )
  3. I need the basic movement and fighting IN the server
  4. This one ISN’T a must have but it’s something I would like; “noclip” fixed (The command atleast! I also wouldn’t mind following/attacking noclip fixed)

Well that’s about it, if any of you know one it would be AMAZING to have!! <3

Read full topic
